verbose_text: The amount of ammonium may be increased by mineralization of organic N and diffusion of benthic ammonium N as a source and decreased by conversion of NH + 4 to NO - 2 or uptake of NH + 4 by algae.
evidence: ammonium may be increased by mineralization of organic N and diffusion of benthic ammonium N as a source and decreased by conversion of NH +  4  to NO -  2  or uptake of NH
